author: CBR
description:
In this clip from CBR's Heroes Journey Podcast Episode 2, Sean O'Connell explains why studios have avoided Robin for decades.

Would you want a Robin in the Pattinson Batman world?

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/bs2IWFKQo4M
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg
